pv21:30.1: kuṇā → kuṇṭhā (bj, pts-vp-pli2ed) | kuṇḍā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
pv21:38.4: yaṃtumassa → yantaṃ assa (sya1ed, sya2ed) | yantamassa (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
pv21:49.3: paripūrayanto → ninnānabhipūrayanto (bj, pts-vp-pli2ed) | ninnāni hi pūrayanto (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
pv21:54.1: Tisahassāni sūdāni hi → tisahassāni sūdā hi (bj, pts-vp-pli2ed) | tisahassāni sūdāni (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | janā tisahassā sūdā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
pv21:54.4: vāvaṭā → vyāvaṭā (bj, pts-vp-pli2ed) | pāvaṭā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
pv21:68.3: Avidūreva buddhassa → avidūre ca buddhassa (pts-vp-pli1ed) | avidūre sambuddhassa (pts-vp-pli2ed, mr)
